name: San Francisco Loaf

variants.name: San Francisco Loaf - Olives
variants.description: San Francisco style Sourdough bread made with organic while flour and olives, fermented for 48 hours

variants.name: San Francisco Loaf - Nigella seeds
variants.description: San Francisco style Sourdough bread made with organic while flour and nigella seeds, fermented for 48 hours

variants.name: San Francisco Loaf - Plain
variants.description: San Francisco style Sourdough bread made with organic while flour, fermented for 48 hours

attributes.title: Ingredients
attributes.details: Organic white flour, malted barley, salt, and young sourdough starter

attributes.title: Allergy Info
attributes.details: This product contains wheat and gluten and may also contain traces of nuts.

attributes.title: Shelf-life and Storage
attributes.details: Enjoy hot or toasted | Keep at room temperature for up to 4 days | For long-term storage, place in zip-lock bags and keep in the freezer for up to 3 months | Bread should not be refrigerated | To serve from freezer, allow bread to thaw at room temp. and then refresh in 180c oven, or toast it right away

attributes.title: Delivery
attributes.details: Sourdough bakery delivers Monday through Saturday of each week upon pre-order with ETA of 2 working days.

description: San Francisco style Sourdough bread made with organic while flour, fermented for 48 hours
